titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Homeland Security, acting through the Under Secretary for Border and Transportation Security, to provide air marshal training to law enforcement personnel of foreign countries.

To amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Homeland Security, acting through the Under Secretary for Border and Transportation Security, to provide air marshal training to law enforcement personnel of foreign countries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary:
Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of Homeland Security, through the Under Secretary for Border and Transportation Security, to provide air marshal training to foreign law enforcement personnel.
Directs the Under Secretary to establish related fees.
